metadata.title: CVE-2022-3816 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found inAxiomatic Bento4. Affected is an unknown function of the componentmp4decrypt. The manipulation leads to memory leak. It is possible to launchthe attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and maybe used. VDB-212682 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
